step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Try to keep your elbows and wrists a bit more stable as you roll your shoulders back and down.
Your shoulder movement is improving. Focus on keeping your elbows and wrists from moving too much during the roll.
Great job completing the repetitions! For the next set, aim for even less movement in your elbows and wrists to isolate the shoulder action.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with your shoulder rolls! Remember to gently squeeze your shoulder blades back and down in a circle. Try to keep your elbows and wrists steady to focus the movement on your shoulders.
